Text.Page:
Thulsa has an argon in there known as the Cardinal of Undeath.

I believe this "cardinal" is none other than Krivalga, one of Thulsa's most powerful necromancers. He's been strangely absent from battle.

Find him and kill him.

So the Cardinal was Krivalga? Excellent. Krivalga was the closest thing Thulsa had to a high priest.

Nicely done, .
